description: This is the main application class for the Llama 3 Finetuning Backend, serving as the entry point and configuration class for the Spring Boot application. It enables async execution and scheduling, and sets up OpenAPI documentation information.

classes.name: FinetuneLlama3BackendApplication
classes.description: Main Spring Boot application class for the backend, configuring scheduling, async execution, and API documentation.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point method that starts the Spring Boot application.
